extendedInfo.description: ââ GET THE NO 1. IPHONE CALENDAR APP ON YOUR ANDROID DEVICE ââWeek Calendar is the most user friendly and all-round calendar app worldwide for everyone that needs to manage a busy schedule. Week Calendar works without setup using the Exchange, Google and other calendars you have configured on your Android device.  â FAST AND EASY TO USEYou're too busy to spend a lot of time managing your schedule. That's why adding, repeating and moving events is made easy in Week Calendar. With its magnificent interface and intuitive usability, working with Week Calendar is a pleasure for both casual as extensive professional users.â  CALENDAR OVERVIEWWeek Calendar provides a clear and detailed overview based on day, week, month or year level. Set one or more calendars to display simulteaous, each with it's own color, to easily sync work, home and project schedules. â PACKED WITH USEFUL FUNCTIONSMove your appointments by simply dragging, copying and pasting. Clear up a busy schedule by assigning different colours or Emoji's/icons to your appointments and events. Powerful reminder functions make sure youâll always remember your events. Customize week numbers and many other functions to suit your own personal needs. â ENHANCE YOUR CALENDAR WITH HOLIDAYS, SPORTS AND OTHER EVENTS Visit our Calendar Store to add additional subscriptions to sports games, national holidays and more to your calendar. Accidentally scheduling an appointment on your free day now belongs to the past! â MOST IMPORTANT FEATURES:- Magnificent overview of your appointments and events in day, week, month and year view- Simply reschedule or copy/paste events using drag and drop- Homescreen widget for fast calendar access- Assign emoji's/icons to your events - Event templates for events you often create- Works without setup for all calendars on your Android device (Exchange, Outlook, Google, Facebook, etc)- Quickly add events on the right time using tap-and-hold- Pinch to zoom for a perfect fit in your screen- Link contacts to events- Advanced repetition rules - Invite participants/ share appointments and events by e-mail- Time zone support for people who travel- Adaptable week numbers - Hide weekends when there are no appointments - Customizable action menu for easy access to often used functionsDo you have questions, complaints or comments? We are more than willing to help or solve any of your questions quickly, we're known for excellent and fast support. You can find the most frequently asked questions on our support website or just drop us a line.

reviews.title: No longer syncs iCal accounts
reviews.comment: This app was the best possible for syncing my android device to my iCal account but this function appears to no longer exist. Shame
reviews.author: Mike Shewchuk

reviews.title: Almost as good as the iPhone version
reviews.comment: The updates are getting better.   New widget is really nice, I just wish it were smaller. You can resize it down to 3x2 but it looks odd. The buttons on the side take up too much space at that size and it would be nice if the current  date button stayed on at that size. 2x2 widget in the new style with buttons on the side would be amazing.  The only consistent bug I have noticed is that all-day events show up on the previous day in the widget.  Getting better :-)
reviews.author: Emily Storey

reviews.title: Mini month doesn\'t show events
reviews.comment: I have numerous recurring monthly events however they do not appear in the mini month view for December. I checked December 2013 & 2014 and the problem is the same. December appears to have no events.
reviews.author: Chad King

reviews.title: HTC one issues
reviews.comment: Every time you enter a item into the cal it changes the time to \"am\". Widget locks up too. Can\'t really use app if you can\'t input information. IOS version worked great, please fix!
reviews.author: Nicholas Adamcheski

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: More options than the stock calendar, but notifications don\'t work AND the Football calendars I\'ve bought only show a few fixtures. On top of that, nowhere near as polished/slick as the iPhone version.
reviews.author: Mark James Rose

reviews.title: Far from what it is on iPhone
reviews.comment: Do not buy until it is no more a pre alpha version! Don\'t get fooled, it\'s light years behind the iOS version, total polished t... for now
reviews.author: Baptiste MARIEN

reviews.title: Lots and lots of bugs
reviews.comment: Moving from month to the next sometimes switches to week view. Adding an event adds it to the next day month or year. On htc one a lot of space gets wasted Slow And worst of all it still is the best calendar app for android.
reviews.author: Benjamin Grauer

reviews.title: Loved and miss my iPhone version!
reviews.comment: Loved and miss iPhone version  Issues with android version  1. Since last update when I edit a PM apointment and save it it changes to AM. Cant correct on phone. I have to log on to gmail calendar to fix it  2. Colored dots in month view or list & search show up on the day before appointments scheduled as all day events. True for holidays too  3 want the option to delete all future recurring events vs all events (or it added as option) otherwise I lose information on past schedule  Tnks!
reviews.author: Stacie Porter

reviews.title: Worthwhile update but demoted
reviews.comment: Aug. 1st: Just as I was giving up on Week Cal, this update came along. It\'s snappier but still buggy.  A couple of issues noted, though- How can I remove that annoying \"calendar store incon\" on the main calendar screen. Also, when going to a new date to enter an event, it defaults to the current date, not the date I went to for the new event. June 22- Nostalgia prevents me from abandoning this app. Hope it reaches its iOS perfection soon.  I loved this app in my iPhone. As an android app, however, it has de
reviews.author: Fred Rabinowitz

reviews.title: Please dedicate some programmer time to this app
reviews.comment: I really want to use this app, in fact I\'d easily pay x10 for it if it was like the iOS version. Couple of bugs: mini month mode didn\'t show some full day events. Then I played with settings and suddenly they appeared but offset by -1 day (not all of them just some of them).  Once they did show up, they displayed correctly in month view just not mini month.... Thanks for your hard work, your vision of a calendar app is worth getting right ad everything I have seen for android pales in comparison.
reviews.author: Torrance Jones

reviews.title: rubbish
reviews.comment: Hopeless  when I scroll through calendars it just chooses arbitrary months and even years. Used all the time on iPhone  but android just does not work
reviews.author: Stephen Riley

reviews.title: Superb ...
reviews.comment: ... but why have you removed the 1x1 widget that shows the date ???
reviews.author: David Mason

reviews.title: Widget
reviews.comment: Widget 4*4 doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Suhas Kashyap

reviews.title: Remove store button
reviews.comment: I paid for your app so remove this ugly store button.  edit: thanks for your change!
reviews.author: flo west

reviews.title: Great so far
reviews.comment: I love this app, but it\'s not as complete as the iPhone version. But, it\'s the only app I\'ve found that allows different colours for different events without having to sync to different calendars.  It\'s simple,  clean, functional and does what you want it to do. It\'s a great app,  keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Sharnel Perera

reviews.title: Buggy - make like ios version, please!!!
reviews.comment: Please make this as nice as your ios version. Does not update new events until I close the calendar, and even then it\'s hit or miss... I used your calendar ALWAYS on my iPhone, and really miss the function!!!
reviews.author: Tyler Brown

reviews.title: Please make it exactly like IOS
reviews.comment: I too owned the ios version and this seems to be a stripped down beta version. Please make this EXACTLY like the ios version that\'s definitely what everyone wants, and in the meantime:                             1. Please Include different calendar themes  2. Please makes the event color dots significantly bigger for the month layout  3. Many of the birthday color dots its pulling from my contacts are on the wrong day for the month view   4. Wouldn\'t let me purchase the US Holiday pack
reviews.author: Brett Albertini

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Had this app on my iphone where it worked well, but have been really disappointed with the Android version. Too many glitches and faults to make it a workable calendar.
reviews.author: Jennifer Sugar

reviews.title: Not bad but quite buggy.
reviews.comment: Will not perform as well as the I phone version. Quite disappointed but still more user friendly than most of the other calender apps I\'ve tried. Wish it would perform consistently. Where has \'paste\' gone?
reviews.author: Jay Baker

reviews.title: No where near as good as ios
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand how one app from iOS can be so poor on the android. I thought it showed promise when they added mini month but it\'s so buggy and unappealing to the eye. This looks more like a beta version than an app that should be on the market. I\'m continuing to keep my fingers crossed since I used this app everyday for years when I had the iPhone.
reviews.author: Tony Wong
